```
data A = Foo Int | Bar Bool
data B = Baz Char | Qux

```

```
data AorB = A A | B B

```

```
type a = [`Foo of int | `Bar of bool]
type b = [`Baz of char | `Quz]
type a_or_b = [a | b]

```

```
data A
data B
data AorB t where
  Foo :: Int -> AorB A
  Bar :: Bool -> AorB A
  Baz :: Char -> AorB B
  Quz :: AorB B

```
